name: Easexport – Gravity Forms Scheduled Entries Export
author: TechnoCrackers

sections.description:
Automating your work processes is a proven method to improve productivity and save time. There are many tasks in our day to day life which we can automate and spend the time in some other productive work. Still, many are spending plenty of time and effort in manual work.

For example, managing gravity forms entries. Currently, Gravity Forms only provides manual export for each form, which means you have to log in, go to form and export entries. But what if there was a plugin that could automatically manage Gravity forms entries maintenance instead of manually? Well, there is a plugin now.

Easexport – Gravity Forms Scheduled Entries Export Plugin is all in one solution for managing Gravity Forms Entries. Once you have installed Easexport – Gravity Forms Scheduled Entries Export Plugin, you don’t have to think about managing the entries because our plugin will automatically send it to you in a timely manner.

Basic features:

* Export is set on daily basis.
* It will send to admin's email address on daily basis.

Premium Features:

Buy Premium
* You can schedule export for each form on a daily, weekly or monthly basis.
* Gives you a choice to select which file needs to be sent.
* Option to add multiple emails.
* Pick the fields you want to send.

We will be adding other exciting features that will further enhance the use of our plugin.

Support

For any queries feel free to drop a line at wordpress@technocrackers.com.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  • Go to your plugin browser inside your wordpress installation and search Easexport - Gravity Forms Scheduled Entries Export by keyword. Then choose “Easexport – Gravity Forms Scheduled Entries Export” and click install. It will be installed shortly.
  • Activate the plugin from Plugins menu after installation

Manual Installation

  • Download the latest version and extract the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • The plugin will appear as inactive in your Plugins menu
  • Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

short_description: Gravity form addon to export entries as CSV and send it to respected emails

screenshots.caption: Settings for each form. It sends email on daily basis over site admin email.
